text:
TIRUNELVELI

St. Xavier’s College: Pongal celebrations, Rev. Fr. Jesu Michael Das SJ, secretary of the college, presides, college premises, 9 a.m.

Sadakkathullah Appa College and All India Radio - Tirunelveli: Pongal special debate, T.E.S. Fathu Rabbani, correspondent, presides, college premises, 10.30 a.m.

Einstein College of Engineering: Pongal celebrations, college premises, 3.30 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, Good Shepherd Matriculation School, 7th Street, Thiyagaraja Nagar, 7 p.m.

VIZHUNTHAYAMBALAM

St. Antony’s Church: Annual festival, sixth day celebrations, rosary and novena, 6 p.m.; Holy Mass by Rev. Fr. Xavier Raj, Assistant Parish Priest, Vencode, homily by Rev. Fr. G. Geo Cletus, parish priest, Vellaiyambalam, church premises, 6.30 p.m.

MARTHANDAM

Karnataka Bank: Inauguration of 702nd branch with onsite ATM facility, A. Al Ameen, president, Marthandam Chamber of Commerce and Industry, chief guest, G. Prakash Kumar, MD, Bharath Group of Companies, lights lamp, Raghavendra Bhat M., General Manager presides, Jayanagaraja Rao, AGM, Chennai Region, and Thomas Kutty Varghese, branch manager, address, NMN Plaza Market Road, 10 a.m.

Tuticorin

Empower Old Age Home: Unity Pongal-2016, J. Jeyasingh Thiyagaraj Natterjee, Member of Parliament, chief guest, inaugurates, A.Sankar, Executive Director, presides, Ganesh Nagar Second Street, 9 a.m.
title: Engagements
